brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the changes in quality of life parameters after LASIK surgery.

detailed_description.textblock: Our purpose is to evaluate the changes in quality of life parameters after LASIK surgery. We intend to create a questionnaire to delineate the changes that occur in LASIK patients at the pre-operative visit and at the 1-month and 3-month post-operative visits. Additional questionnaires will be administered to demonstrate the validity of the new questionnaire. The approximate time the patient will be required to spend in clinic will be approximately 45 minutes at each of the three visits.

clinical_study.why_stopped: PI decided to terminate the study at this time

intervention.intervention_name: Role of psychosocial and quality of life parameters prior to and following LASIK.
